references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational, demonstrating the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image generation, thus establishing the basis for many subsequent works in the field.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a crucial foundation for many of the efficient diffusion models explored in the target paper.
This paper introduced DDIM, a deterministic sampling method that offers significant improvements in speed and efficiency, a key aspect relevant to the focus on quantized models in the target paper.
This paper directly addresses the problem of quantizing diffusion models, a core subject of the target paper and provides a baseline method for comparison.

This work also directly tackles the problem of post-training quantization of diffusion models, offering another important approach and comparison point for the new method proposed in the target paper.
